name: Vibrant Spectrum Mobile
description:
This is a game that was originally designed as a card game. I created the card game version as a project for one of my college classes. I fell in love with the mechanics of this game and was inspired to create a mobile version.

In this game, you rearrange gems on a board to align with your tokens for high scores. The highest score wins.

It is a multiplayer game meant for 2 people to play together. No AI has been programmed yet.

Instructions found in game under the Tutorial Menu.

Gem Descriptions are also available in game.

There are certain functions of this game that have bugs, such as the reset function and have been disabled for the demo.
